New Records: Virat Kohli and K. L. Rahul scored half centuries to set a target of 184 for 6
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored 64 not out off 44 balls
K. L. Rahul scored 50 off 32 balls
Post-Match Reflections: A piece of sheer on-field brilliance by a rejuvenated KL Rahul and divine intervention by the weather gods took India one step closer to the T20 World Cup semifinals
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was rain-curtailed, helping India pull off a narrow win
India posted an imposing total of 184 for 6
The match was played on November 2, 2022, in Adelaide, Australia
